items.name: Boarding School
items.desc: Students and faculty enjoy a familial relationship on a self-contained campus

items.name: Arcane Enclave
items.desc: Drawn together by cutting-edge magical scholarship, the enclave's residents are hungry for secrets, reagents, and subjects.

items.name: Secret Monastery
items.desc: Ageless secrets remain the focus of contemplation and rigorous training at this site.

items.name: Elite Institute
items.desc: This cutthroat college of science or the arts accepts only the creme de la creme of society and talent.

items.name: Vault of Secrets
items.desc: This conspiracy strives to keep or eradicate all knowledge of a specific truth.

items.name: Museum of Dreams
items.desc: Magical communication or shared dreamscapes connect a network of wide-ranging specialists.

items.name: Harried Functionary
items.desc: A disinterested secretary conveys written correspondence to you from an exceptionally busy or aloof senior faculty member.

items.name: Celebrated Instructor
items.desc: Despite their throngs of ambitious assistants, a celebrity researcher considers you their star pupil.

items.name: Wizened Fixture
items.desc: A fantastically old, believed-to-be-deceased librarian gives you assignments from the circulation desk they never leave.

items.name: Infatuated Tourist
items.desc: A flirtatious visiting scholar perceives your every report and donated discovery as a personal gift.

items.name: Spectral Fragment
items.desc: A haunted piece of the academy's collection compels you to complete its secret research.

items.name: Distant Observer
items.desc: A mysterious sponsor encourages your research from afar to avoid alerting nefarious forces embedded within the academy's bureaucracy.

items.name: Aberrant Zoology

items.name: Arcanodynamics
items.desc: You investigate the ways magic underpins existence, exploring its flows and seeking ways to harness its nexuses.

items.name: Forbidden History
items.desc: You reveal the lost truths of the world's darkest ages, pursuing the history of purposefully hidden or taboo eras.

items.name: Cryptogeography
items.desc: You search for proof of a hidden land or that the world isn't structured as commonly assumed.

items.name: Restorative Antiquarianism
items.desc: You track clues leading to plundered artifacts and then restore them to their rightful owners.

items.name: Evolutionary Divinity
items.desc: You dare to explore what no mortal was meant to know: the origins of divinity.
